etymology.description: Currently, insufficient information is available to provide a detailed breakdown of the character 甡(甡) (shēn, 'broom') and its components in terms of its evolution or type.
etymology.interpretation: There is a lack of detailed information on how 甡(甡) (shēn, 'broom') evolved or its components. It is vital to consult additional resources or historical texts for a more comprehensive understanding.

examples.chinese: 他用甡(甡)清扫庭院(清掃庭院)。
examples.english: He uses the broom to sweep the courtyard.

examples.chinese: 晨曦将至时(晨曦將至時)，老人挥动甡(甡)扫净石板路(掃淨石板路)。
examples.pinyin: Chénxī jiāng zhì shí, lǎorén huīdòng shēn sǎojìng shíbǎnlù.
examples.english: As the dawn approaches, the old man waves the broom to clean the stone path.
